name: phantom-zod
description: TypeScript-first schema validation library built on Zod

scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): bump patch version' && git push origin main
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): bump minor version' && git push origin main
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && git add package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): bump major version' && git push origin main

author: Dave Carty
